[
    Expression(
        SemicolonTerminated {
            inner: AssignmentOperation(
                Assign {
                    left: Variable(
                        SimpleVariable(
                            SimpleVariable {
                                span: Span(
                                    3,
                                    1,
                                ),
                                name: "a",
                            },
                        ),
                    ),
                    span: Span(
                        3,

                    ),
                    right: ShortArray(
                        Bracketed {
                            left_bracket: Span(
                                3,
                                6,
                            ),
                            inner: CommaSeparated {
                                inner: [
                                    ArrayItem {
                                        key: None,
                                        value: Variable(

                                                    span: Span(
                                                        3,

                                                },
                                            ),

                                        unpack: false,

                                                },
                                            ),

                                        unpack: false,
                                        by_ref: false,
